title: Verv
intro: Verv is a voluntary position for those with an extra passion or desire to make a change for the better in Syntax. Verv gives extra responsibility, meaning more effort is required. Consecutively it creates opportunities to establish new relationships, for example by participating in our intern events.

committeeSection.title: What do you do with verv?
committeeSection.intro: Syntax consists of 3 committees with different tasks. Below you will find a short description of each committee and their typical tasks.

eventkom.title: Evntkom
eventkom.intro: Evntkom are responsible for Syntaxs events.
eventkom.body: With verv in Eventkom you will be very visible on campus. You help host, and get to join the events of Syntax. This is the committee for you if you like to be responsible, but at the same time be social and try new things.

tekkom.title: TekKom
tekkom.intro: TekKom develops the infrastructure of Syntax.
tekkom.body: This is a very open verv where you can help with existing projects like this website or the Syntax app, or start your own. We both need experienced developers, and designers.

bedkom.title: Bedkom
bedkom.intro: Bedkom is the face of Syntax towards companies, and they are responsible for our company presentations and cyberdays.
bedkom.body: With verv in Bedkom you will help communicate both with our students, and our companies. Bedkom promotes events and other topics related to Syntax in social media. Bedkom also helps with recruitment. Here you will be able to make a difference for the students, at the same time as you get to know companies.

apply.title: Apply for verv
apply.body: The committees are continuously accepting applications below. For further questions or if you have not been convinced yet, please reach out to the respective committee leader. For general inquiries you may reach our recruitment manager via Discord, or send us a mail.
